name: Time for love (LumbirBwut)
description:
Dodge obstacles to your relationship as much as possible ! (Clue : The closer you are, more points you score but faster are the obstacles)

(Don't forget to put on full screen, see bottom right corner)

  • Play with keyboard only :)
  • Can be played with two players (playing solo is possible but it requires more skills)

Made by me in approximately 43 hours.

It's a polish version of this game : https://lumbirbwut.itch.io/time-for-love-jam previously made in 5 hours for Trijam#106 : Time is relative:

My personnal HighScore in Infinite Mode, controlling both hearts is 24 850.

Feel free to share yours in the comments :)
